name: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings
– all drawings are the latest revision
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: QMP, TMP, SWMS & ITP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
1.3 - Ensure correct materials are being used
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Topsoil placed on formations and disturbed areas shall be capable of supporting healthy, full cover of grass growth, and contain organic material
○ Topsoil material shall be free from subsoil, tree roots, clay balls, stones, rocks, rubbish, contaminants, weeds, pathogens and toxic levels of any element with a pH in the range of 5 to 8.
○ Imported topsoil shall conform to the material properties outlined in Table 720.042
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: ITP Signed, Material Test Report (Import Only)
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Area has been pegged out in accordance with the drawings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: An excavation permit must be issued prior to any excavation commencing.
○ Plant and equipment shall be appropriate for the task.
○ Excavation operations shall not disturb areas outside the limit of excavation
2.3 - Designation of stock pile area or disposal site
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: An area for stockpiling has been designated or a disposal site identified
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Site has been inspected for noxious weeds and weed treated if present
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Stockpiles maintained neatly and away from stormwater drains
○ Stockpile treated to minimise spread of weeds and pathogens
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Confirm underlying cut/fill areas comply with Cl204.03 before placing topsoil. All disturbed areas not paved or landscaped topsoiled to the following depths:
○ verge - 50mm outer edge to 20mm within 100mm of seal
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Area topsoiled spread, levelled, but not compacted (except verge area).
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
